Germany: The pope Pope Stephen V crowned Guy III of Spoleto, his preferred claimant to the throne of Italy, Holy Roman Emperor.
Battle of Leuven (891): An East Frankish force repelled a Viking invasion at modern Leuven.
Belgium: Norse invaders defeated in Battle on the Dijle.
Armenia: King Ashot I dies and is succeeded by his son Smbat I, in 892.
